Subskills.name: Ancient Magic
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by age proliferation.

Subskills.name: Eons Ago
Subskills.description: Increases the duration of age proliferation.

Subskills.name: Growing Old
Subskills.description: Age proliferation grows in size and deals increased damage with every pulse.

Subskills.name: Bridge Between Reality
Subskills.description: Increases the range of age proliferation.

Subskills.name: Restoring Proliferation
Subskills.description: Chance to restore a portion of your maximum mana on hit.

Subskills.name: Breaking The Cycle
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict arcane break on hit.

Subskills.name: Effortless Path
Subskills.description: Decreases movement diminish with age proliferation.

Subskills.name: Additional Faith
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to unleash an additional beam on a nearby monster.

Subskills.name: Scorching Magic
Subskills.description: Age proliferation now unleashes scorching fire balls towards monsters on hit inflicting burning and slowing them.

Subskills.name: Rapid Aging
Subskills.description: Chance to critically hit dealing increased critical strike damage.

Subskills.name: Burning Aging
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict shadow burning on hit.

Subskills.name: Centuries Within Seconds
Subskills.description: Increases the tick frequency of age proliferation.

Subskills.name: Age Multiliferation
Subskills.description: Unleash age proliferation at multiple nearby monsters splitting the damage between beams.

Subskills.name: Arcane Echo
Subskills.description: Summon an arcane echo of your self casting age proliferation at nearby targets. Age proliferation now has a cooldown.
